attributes.action: Prevent Neath and Port Talbot Council from closing Rhiwfawr Primary School
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is Neath and Port Talbot Councils intention to close Rhiwfawr School which serves a rural community.  The school is clasified as Tranditional Welsh School and has over 100 years of history, is increasing in numbers and has an outstanding inspection report.  The school lies at the heart of the village which would be devastated by its loss.
